content.raw: The online models repo hasn't been synced with the latest updates to the gazebo_models repo as they're incompatible with the last stable release, so in order to use them you need to get the gazebo_models repo (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models) and add it to your ``GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`` (and make sure there's no old polaris model in ``~/.gazebo/models`` ... or just copy paste the new model in there).
content.html: The online models repo hasn't been synced with the latest updates to the gazebo_models repo as they're incompatible with the last stable release, so in order to use them you need to get the gazebo_models repo (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models) and add it to your GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH (and make sure there's no old polaris model in ~/.gazebo/models ... or just copy paste the new model in there).
